about_the_game:
Embark on an endless journey of exploration in an ever-changing landscape of small American towns. Each new game presents a procedurally generated town. Roam freely, engage with NPCs, and stir up some chaos as you navigate the streets. The thrill doesn't end within town limits - step beyond the town's boundaries at any time to instantly generate a new, unique town to delve into. The heart of adventure beats in every new town, with unending variety at your fingertips.

Key Gameplay Features:

Procedurally Generated American Towns: A new game means a new town. No two adventures are ever the same.

Interaction and Chaos: Engage with NPCs as you explore and turn up the heat with some impromptu chaos.

Unending Exploration: Step outside the town boundaries whenever you wish, and a brand-new town will instantly generate for you to explore next.
